Text.val: 22.11.2010 SH SCR15936 Added BPH353.PO.RUNNUMBER and BPH354.PI.RUNNUMBER
-- Reset error code in case of retry from online program
-- Start to store payments/descriptions and updating the statement
-- In case of errors are detected, update NFPR
-- In some cases the statements have to be skipped, see BPH350, so
the current selected NFPS row has to be removed, see G.S.
-- If statement is OK then BADT, BADP, BDPD rows have to be stored with BPH353,
-- End of statement does not exists
-- No payment (0100 row) exists, curent statetement can be deleted
... at least one 0100 row must exists (statements without payments have to be
@Task aborted if an error is detected in one of the further parts
... reset counter for descriptions per transaction (=payment)
... remove leading zeros from account number
.. last two digits from file are decimals

ExpSyntax.val: 'Payment'&' '&Trim (Str ({0,3},'9'))&' '&'The value date is outside of range from'&' '&DStr ({0,13},'DD.MM.YYYY')&' '&'to'&' '&DStr ({0,14},'DD.MM.YYYY')
